structure.unit: B FERTILIZER AND PESTICIDE USE AND APPLICATION

law.text: A pest control company shall be required and responsible to use only trained personnel such that a new employee shall work under the full-time supervision of a certified applicator for at least thirty (30) days and sales and service personnel shall receive a training course approved by the department on recommendation of the Pest Control Advisory Board.
law.history: Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 13, effective June 17, 1978.
